definition: (Internet slang) to go away/to slink off/(transliteration of "go die", possibly from 去死[qu4 si3])
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
to mend one's ways (idiom)/to turn over a new leaf
to be made to stand still as a punishment
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
lit. to drive a lightweight chariot on a familiar road (idiom)/fig. to do sth routinely and with ease/a walk in the park
lit. without wind there cannot be waves (idiom); there must be a reason/no smoke without fire
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
to lose one's cool/to get impatient/unable to remain calm
